line.text: When my love swears that she is made of truth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I do believe her though I know she lies
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That she might think me some untutored youth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Unlearned in the world false subtleties
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thus vainly thinking that she thinks me young
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Although she knows my days are past the best
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Simply I credit her false-speaking tongue
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: On both sides thus is simple truth suppressed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But wherefore says she not she is unjust
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And wherefore say not I that I am old
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O love best habit is in seeming trust
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And age in love loves not to have years told
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Therefore I lie with her and she with me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And in our faults by lies we flattered be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
